movePieceFromE2ToE4

resources.string: Spusti topa na b4 (samo u Crazyhouseu)

string.name: readOutClocks
string.comment:
readOutClocks
This is the help text for one of the possible keyboard commands. When this command is entered, the current clocks (player's remaining time) is read out loud. 'Read out' is used as a verb here.

resources.string: Ako ne razumiješ zapis poteza iznad, nauči više ovdje:
Dodavanje \"x\" za označavanje uzimanja nije obavezno
I slova \"o\" i znamenka \"0\" mogu se koristiti za rokadu

string.name: ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
string.comment:
ifItIsLegalToCastleBothWays
'Enter' as in the key on a standard keyboard.

resources.string: Ako su moguće obje rokade, pritisnite enter za malu rokadu

string.name: capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
string.comment:
capitalizationOnlyMattersInAmbiguousSituations
Note: Piece letters (K, Q, R, B, N) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Velika i mala slova su bitna samo u višeznačnim situacijama s lovcem i pješakom u b stupcu
Za unošenje predporeza samo unesi željeni predpotez prije nego što je tvoj red za igru
